message.body: Hey so just so you know, rave isn't showing into the woods. For some weird reason.
Oh no!
What are they showing?
American sniper, the wedding ringer, taken 3, the boy next door, and Selma. I don't know. Maybe they are playing it but not listing it, but these are listed obline.
Whoa. That's upsetting.
I called them and they said they never showed it there at all :(
I know. I just got home. I'm going to do some research about this.
Okay. Well just let me know if you want to see another movie or go somewhere else. I can do either.
Oh m g!!!!!
The Ritz at the Bourse is showing it!!!
That'a perfect because that's probably one of my favorite theaters!
6:50 or 9:30! You down???
Yes!! Wanna do 9:30 movie? Maybe go somewhere for dinner around 7?
How much are movies tickets usually?
Wait, do you know of the Ritz East movie theater?
I've never heard of any of these.
Me either. I'm googling them to see where they are and how much thu cost.
I'm assuming it can't be some outrageous price.
Finally! Found it. That took longer than it should have. The 9:30 showing for tomorrow is $10 at the Bourse.
Oh that's fine with me if it is with you!
Yea it's totally fine. Turns out, this was not the theater I was referring to. I've actually never been here but the exterior looks nice!
Well, it'll be an adventure?
Hahah yes! Wow the Interior of the place is full of shops and food!
Okay, it is so targeted at tourists!
Let's pretend it's our first time in philly and just look amazed!!!!
Ahhh we totally should! Don't you wish you have an "I love Philly" shirt right about now?!
Seriously!!!
I know I've seen this building!!! Just trying to place it in my mind and reminder it's surrounding.
*its
I'm sure I have too but I don't recall it at all!
I think it's in the Old City section but it's in a spot we don't go to a lot
Well, it should be fun
Yay somewhere new!!!
Oh okay, I know. It's off of Market Street! A few blocks down from Franklin Fountain and where Lucy's was.
Okay! Sounds good. I'm excited!
Whoo whoop! Alrighty. Me too. Good luck on your quiz tomorrow! Kick son w ass and then go see a musical hahah :)
Hey. So what time did you want to meet? I don't know if you want to eat on the food court or somewhere else.
Hey! So this happened: ￼￼￼
I'm waiting to hear word from my brother-in-law because I asked him to look at it.
Either have to get a new one it to get it fixed.
No worries. Just the one or multiple? That's awful!
I'm going to see if I could have the spare put on or borrow a car. I'll will update you! I'm sorry!!!
It's okay!!! No worries. If we have to reschedule then we do. Not a big deal. Although it'll have to be next Friday because I have to go to a KenCrest lunch tomorrow and homework Sunday :(
You busy bee! Okay, I'll let you know later today. Man, this has been a rough few months automobile-wise :(
Seriously!! Good luck!
Thanks.
